
=head1 NAME

org_academic

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 short_name (character varying(45)) - 
 long_name (character varying(256)) - 
 address (character varying(45)) - 
 email (character varying(45)) - 
 url (character varying(128)) - 
 notes (character varying(1024)) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                             Table "gcis_metadata.org_academic"
    Column   |          Type           |                         Modifiers                         | Storage  | Description 
 ------------+-------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------+----------+-------------
  id         | integer                 | not null default nextval('org_academic_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    | 
  short_name | character varying(45)   |                                                           | extended | 
  long_name  | character varying(256)  |                                                           | extended | 
  address    | character varying(45)   |                                                           | extended | 
  email      | character varying(45)   |                                                           | extended | 
  url        | character varying(128)  |                                                           | extended | 
  notes      | character varying(1024) |                                                           | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "org_academic_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
